## IKeyManagerSharedSecretArgs.secretKeyRef property

The secret key handle (`kid`) as returned by [keyManagerCreate](./core.ikeymanager.keymanagercreate.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
secretKeyRef: string
```
